name: df-goim
body: |- wceq(cgoi, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, co(cv(s0), cgna, cgon(cv(s1)))))
comment: Define the Godel-set of implication. Here the arguments ` U ` and ` V ` are also Godel-sets corresponding to smaller formulas. Note that this is a _class_ expression, not a wff. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.)
